channel.title: Raspberry Pi on dadenCKEP-wiki

item.title: Grafana + ex
item.description: セットアップ編 Grafana 導入手順: https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/installation/debian/ echo "deb https://packages.grafana.com/oss/deb stable main" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/grafana.list sudo apt update | sudo apt install grafana -y InfluxDB sudo apt update | sudo apt install influxdb -y
